mapper.insert: insert into coupons(code, name, type, description, total_quantity, validity_type, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, days_after_claim, discount_percent, min_spend, max_discount_amount, discount_amount) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{description}, #{totalQuantity}, #{validityType}, #{validStartTime}, #{validEndTime}, #{daysAfterClaim}, #{discountPercent}, #{minSpend}, #{maxDiscountAmount}, #{discountAmount})
mapper.update: update coupons set claimed_quantity = claimed_quantity + 1 where id = #{couponId} and (total_quantity is null or total_quantity > claimed_quantity)
UPDATE coupons SET status = 2 WHERE status IN (0, 1) AND NOW() > valid_end_time
mapper.select: select id, code, name, type, description, status, total_quantity, claimed_quantity, used_quantity, validity_type, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, days_after_claim, discount_percent, min_spend, max_discount_amount, discount_amount, create_time, update_time from coupons where id = #{couponId}
